name: Sector ETF Rotation Signal Analysis
question: Which sector ETFs are showing technical rotation signals for sector switching strategies?
description: Analyzes major sector ETFs (XLK, XLF, XLE, XLV, XLI, etc.) for relative strength changes, momentum shifts, and technical breakouts that signal sector rotation opportunities. Compares cross-sector performance and identifies emerging leadership for tactical allocation adjustments.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get major sector ETF universe for rotation analysis (XLK, XLF, XLE, XLV, XLI, XLP, XLU, XLY, XLB)
Step 2: Get historical price data for sector ETFs and market benchmark for relative strength calculations
Step 3: Get current sector ETF prices for real-time rotation signal confirmation
Step 4: Calculate sector relative strength, momentum shifts, and technical breakout signals across timeframes
Step 5: Rank sector ETFs by rotation signal strength and leadership probability
